sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' // useState로만 해보기 function SubmitForm() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [getDate, setGetDate] = useState(''); // 초기값 뭘로?? const [isMemo, setIsMemo] = useState(false); const [memoText, setMemoText] = useState(''); const [repurchase, setRepurchase] = useState(''); const [newForm, setNewForm] = useState({}) const handleSubmit = () => { setNewForm({ id: new Date(), name: name, price: price, category: category, date: getDate, memoCheck: isMemo, memoText: memoText, repurchase: repurchase, }) } return (
setName(event.target.value)}/>
setPrice(event.target.value)}/>
setIsMemo(!isMemo)}/> {/* 메모 작성 버튼을 눌렀을 때만 보이도록 */} { isMemo && setMemoText(event.target.value)}/> }
setRepurchase(event.target.value)}/> setRepurchase(event.target.value)}/>
) } export default SubmitForm
